description.value:
Special: Primitive (8), Blast (2), Inaccurate, Unstable

Note: May require Exotic Weapon Training to use. Returns to the user if it misses, and can be caught with a +0 Agility Test, if fail by 3+ DoF roll 1d10: 1-5: nothing happens. 6-8: nothing happens this turn, but roll again next turn. 9-10: weapon explodes, destroying itself and damaging all in range.
